name: Action Sheep Accurate Parachute Simulator
description:
You fall, you break, you collect, you die. The circle of life - if you are a cool sheep.

Avoid the spikes and collect coins to gain back health. Use your parachute to slow down - but be aware: you can only use it so long at once.

Controls:

A/D or Left and Right on Controller D-Pad:move left and rightSpace or A-Button:use parachute to fall slowerLeft Shift or B-Button: dive to fall quicker
